name: NeonCode 2: FREE Techdemo
description:
THIS GAME IS IN PRE-ALPHA STATE AND UNDER ACTIVE DEVELOPMENT!

This game is a prototype/techdemo for our game in development. This game will be the sequel of NeonCode!

Join us on Discord and follow the development!

The first version was made for Global Game Jam 2021 within 72 hours. Later we started to polish it which is still in progress, but finally, it's in a kind of playable state.

Blue Tiger story: "Mr. James Klueso reaches out to us in a holographic message. There was a bank heist in the past days and from the safe, his precious and beloved Blue Tiger jewel has been stolen. It's our duty to wrap up this investigation and find the gem."

Credits: 

Story and Dialogs: Gábor Bocsi Programming: László Molnár Level Design + Programming: Zsolt Várady
